name: Duet
overview:
Choose your tactic. You can set off on your own, relying on your cunning and stealth to break into enemy territory, or you can be part of a human machine, a shock squad made up of just two people who must show cooperation and wit. team to be able to survive. Regardless of the method chosen, the mission remains the same: to seize vital documents and return home safe and sound.
Your task is far from easy. The odds are not in your favor with all those minefields to dodge and tanks and patrols to be wary of. So grit your teeth and prepare for battle.
